UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Conformation and lytic activity of eumenine mastoparan: a new antimicrobial peptide from wasp venom.
Literature.Author: dos Santos Cabrera MP, de Souza BM, Fontana R, Konno K, Palma MS, de Azevedo WF Jr, Neto JR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus saprophyticus(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=>100µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis CCT 2471(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli CCT 1371(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=>100µg/ml)
